statements: DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Suppliers';
DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier X';

DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3 OR supplier_phone = '123-456-7890';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 2001 AND vendor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
